s:aPostProcessor.name: HaloMaker
s:aPostProcessor.description: The HaloMaker code finds halo in a dark matter particle simulation ...

representation.name: halo
representation.description: halo objects found in raw simulation data

property.name: x
property.description: X (cartesian) coordinate of the halo in the cubic box
property.label: pos.cartesian.x

property.name: y
property.description: Y (cartesian) coordinate of the halo in the cubic box
property.label: pos.cartesian.y

property.name: z
property.description: Z (cartesian) coordinate of the halo in the cubic box
property.label: pos.cartesian.z

property.name: halo id
property.description: Unique identifier of the halo that can be compared with the halo identifier present in galaxies
property.label: meta.id

property.name: velocity x
property.description: X-coordinate of the velocity of the center of mass of the halo
property.label: phys.veloc

property.name: velocity y
property.description: Y-coordinate of the velocity of the center of mass of the halo
property.label: phys.veloc

property.name: velocity z
property.description: Z-coordinate of the velocity of the center of mass of the halo
property.label: phys.veloc

property.name: angular momentum x
property.description: X-coordinate of angular momentum of the halo
property.label: phys.angMomentum

property.name: angular momentum y
property.description: Y-coordinate of angular momentum of the halo
property.label: phys.angMomentum

property.name: angular momentum z
property.description: Z-coordinate of angular momentum of the halo
property.label: phys.angMomentum

property.name: number of galaxies
property.description: Number of galaxies in the halo
property.label: meta.number

property.name: virial mass
property.description: Virial mass of the halo (i.e. by definition here the sum of the masses of all particles belonging to the halo. Units are 10^11 solar masses
property.label: phys.mass

property.name: virial radius
property.description: Virial radius of the halo, in physical Mpc
property.label: phys.size.radius

property.name: virial temperature
property.description: Virial temperature of the halo, in Kelvin
property.label: phys.temperature

property.name: mass of cold gas
property.description: Mass of cold gas (including metals and stars) in the halo, i.e. mass of the galaxies, in 10^11 M_sun
property.label: phys.mass

property.name: mass of metals in cold gas
property.description: Mass of metals in the cold gas of the halo, in 10^11 M_sun
property.label: phys.mass

property.name: mass of hot gas
property.description: Mass of hot gas in the halo (including metals), in 10^11 M_sun
property.label: phys.mass

property.name: mass of metals in hot gas
property.description: Mass of metals in the hot gas of the halo, in 10^11 M_sun
property.label: phys.mass

property.name: mass of stars
property.description: Mass of stars in the halo
property.label: phys.mass

property.name: mass of metals in stars
property.description: Mass of metals in the stars of the halo
property.label: phys.mass

property.name: potential energy
property.description: Potential energy of the halo
property.label: phys.energy

property.name: kinetic energy
property.description: Kinetic energy of the halo
property.label: phys.energy

property.name: total energy
property.description: Total energy of the halo
property.label: phys.energy

property.name: spin parameter
property.description: Spin parameter of the halo
property.label: phys.veloc.ang

representation.label: halo

parameter.name: NPart
parameter.description: Minimum number of particles per halo. Any group found with less than this is discarded.

parameter.name: Method
parameter.description: The algorithm used to find groups of particles. FOF stands for friends-of-friends.

parameter.name: b
parameter.description: The linking length parameter used for the FOF algorithm.

parameter.name: centerMethod
parameter.description: Method used to determine the center of halos. CDM for center of mass.

parameter.name: treeMethod
parameter.description: Method used to construct merger trees.
